actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to authorize the construction of a dry reservoir in Wilson County, Tennessee, and for other purposes.
short_title: Sinking Creek Flood Control Act of 1989

summary.text: Sinking Creek Flood Control Act of 1989 - Authorizes the Secretary of the Army to construct a dry reservoir, for flood control purposes, near Sinking Creek in Wilson County, Tennessee. Earmarks funds for such reservoir which shall be maintained by the city of Lebanon, Tennessee.

titles.title: Sinking Creek Flood Control Act of 1989
A bill to authorize the construction of a dry reservoir in Wilson County, Tennessee, and for other purposes.
